website_summaries.verdict: A well-known lubricant that also helps prevent rust from forming.
pros: Helps protect metal from moisture to prevent rust
Has many other uses, especially as a lubricant
Easy to use and gets into hard-to-reach areas
cons: Not the most robust rust protector

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: When WD-40 was first made, the makers most likely didn't know it could be used for more than loosing a bolt. We use it to remove sticker glue. I just got out of hospital, and they had heart monitors all over my body and when they removed the wires, it left black gooey all over my body. Soap and a lot of washing didn't remove this black sticker goo, but the wd-40 did and afterwards you just wash the oily spray off and you look like a new body. I always keep a can of wd-40.
customer_reviews.author: Where the ratings

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Reviving My Real Wood Floors
customer_reviews.text: I have real wood floors, and stairs, not laminate. I have tried many products to try to renew the worn wood spots, and rejuvenate my floors, but someone told me about trying WD 40 for bringing up real wood floors, and is it ever perfect. I don't spray too much, and apply it with a dry Swiffer mop, it makes the wood so healthy and gives a finish as I had wished I might have obtained from other products. Try it you will be pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Ann

customer_reviews.title: I am so amazed at all the stuff WD-40 can be used for
customer_reviews.text: I am so amazed at all the stuff WD-40 can be used for! Not only have I cleaned all my garden and carpentry tools, I've removed labels, stopped noisy hinges, and I even use it to clean my hands when I'm done piddlin' around. I love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Haddock

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRICE AND GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: GREAT PRICE AND GREAT PRODUCT, I USE FOR EVERYTHING, MY LATEST TEST IS OUR TOILET BOWLS, I SPRAYED UP IN THE AREA WHERE THE WATER SOMES OUT IN THE BOWL, MOST WATER WILL LEAVE CHEMICAL RESIDUE, RUST BUILDUP, LET IT SET FOR A FEW HOURS, MELTED LIKE MAGIC,
customer_reviews.author: Dale Howard

customer_reviews.title: A Tenth World Wonder
customer_reviews.text: The WD-Forty works well enough that I have some handy at all times. I use it for everything that is metal and even some plastic jobs too. When I’m down to the last can I reorder knowing I’ll get the same results from Can to Can to Can. I’ve tried the rest and came back to the best. Four Stars ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gunnar Vogtmann

customer_reviews.title: POORLY DESIGNED SPRAY TIP
customer_reviews.text: Been buying WD40 for 50 years. THEY REALLY DROPPED THE BALL ON THIS NEW PLASTIC SPRAY TOP. THE CHEAP POORLY DESIGNED PLASTIC SPRY TOP MALFUNCTIONED BECAUSE THE LITTLE PLASTIC PINS THAT SNAP INTO THE PLASTIC BEND. THIS CAUSES THE CONTENTS TO SPRAY EVERYWHERE BUT WHERE YOU INTEND. DID WD 40 TEST THIS SPRAY TOP BEFORE THEY PUT IN PRODUCTION??? DID THEY PURPOSELY PLAN TO SELL CHEAPLY MADE AND POORLY DESIGNED TOPS SO THE PRODUCT IS WASTED WHEN USED SO THE CONSUMER HAS TO PURCHASE MORE ??? VERY DISAPPOINTING. WOULD LOVE TO POST PICS BUT NO PLACE HERE TO UPLOAD.
customer_reviews.author: Knight

customer_reviews.title: Best "all round" lubricant/cleaner that I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best "all round" lubricant/cleaner that I have ever used. You read all the "cons" but moderate regular use fits my likings . . . from squeaky doors, loosening stiff bolts, to cleaning/lubricating my bicycle chain. And you'll read a lot of reasons why not to use for bicycles to which I'll disagree. Nevertheless, it's the all round lubricant for me. With the new spray nozzle, I don't lose that red/skinny tube anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Why does industry mess with things
customer_reviews.text: I do not know what happened to the small nozzles that have been on aerial cans for decades. This new system is awful, Liquid sprays everywhere but where it was intended. And with such force it gets the lubricant everywhere but where it was intended. This is not the sellers fault but I would search for a can with the traditional nozzle. I had no complaints about the seller or the process. All way great. Product leaves much to be desired.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: WD-40 is a Staple in my Garage, and now I can Transplant A Flexible tube Top to these cans and save LOTS of $$
customer_reviews.text: I had recently purchased the WD-40 offering with the flexible tube. THAT thing is great, but overly expensive compared to these standard type cans. But Guess What? If you ever did buy the can with the flexible tube, you will never have to again. I have simply been transplanting the top from my now-empty flexible tube can to regular cans such as these and get all the convenience without the added expense. As for WD-40 itself, it has always been my goto for MANY metal remediation projects.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Giliberti

customer_reviews.title: good product for hardware/stains clothes with overspray and droplets
customer_reviews.text: WD 40 is always reliable and is a good product. It does what I want to stop squeeling hinges and moving parts, and to lubricate moving parts and connections. It hinders rust. Drawbacks are that it smells bad and it greasy so it is hard to clean up. If it gets on your clothes, it will stain them and if you get it on your hands and then touch your clothes It stains, so use this with something you do not care about getting ruined.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fixed my lock!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. I don't know why, but the lock to the driver's door of my 98' Corolla stopped working (key wouldn't turn, couldn't open the door). I spent a few weeks climbing in through the passenger's side because I was too lazy/busy/cheap to go the the mechanic but I ordered this WD 40 and tried loading up the lock with it for two days in a row and on the second day I can now use the driver's side door again!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah K.

customer_reviews.title: broken spray tops
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for many years. It works well. When I ordered this twin pack it set on the shelf for several months. When i opened it up i discovered that part of the red ring that holds the folding sprayer to the bottle had broken off on each of the containers. It does not stay attached to the can, making it difficult to use. i don't need new cans of oil but a couple of new folding spray tops would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my car. But who knows the first try happened today when I couldn't get a brush attachment off my Bissel Vacuum cleaner hose. I exhausted my strength to deal with the friction but I failed. Finally I came up with an idea to try this WD40, and with only two sprays, I was able to unscrew the hose! What a magic.
customer_reviews.author: Aria

customer_reviews.title: It works and it’s easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My son has ASD and certain things bother him and trigger aggression... most of our doors in the house squeaked so he was going around with his ears covered and super tense. Sprayed this on all door hinges and the squeaking stopped immediately. Fast delivery (thankfully), effective, and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: Solid product, will buy again and again
customer_reviews.text: WD-40 is an amazing product and I use it on a lot of tasks. I only use one other brand when I really need to do a job absolutely perfect. Will buy again, this 2-fer is a good kit at a good price. Glad they added the nozzle that will do a misted spray but also can use the tube for more direct application.
customer_reviews.author: NCBirdman

customer_reviews.title: Way more than I need, but works great
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could just buy one can at the same price rate. Still, I just cleaned my bike and bike lock recently with this stuff and they work great. My bike doesn't squeak anymore and my bike lock, which previously was very stubborn, slides right out when I turn the key.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: It makes annoying squeaks stop. Hinges, crank bearings, MRI machines, etc. Try it on your annoying coworker. Just one shot of wd 40 in their mouth and they shut right up.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Wencil

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. As always a great lubricant. The sprayer is accurate and the hinge close is a great convenience and now I wont lose the straw!
customer_reviews.author: rkruz

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Super excited to get this can that doesn't work. The WD-40 just drizzles into a puddle down the can. Awesome! And it's not eligible for return. Thanks for the waste of $$!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne99

customer_reviews.title: Every manufacturer should have this smart straw can design.
customer_reviews.text: There is not much I can tell you about the actual lubricant that you don’t already know, however these cans are a huge leap forward. I hate the straws that always get lost or pop out of the old style cans just when you finally get the tip where you need it to be. These smart straw cans are extremely durable and a very welcome improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Tom & Emily

customer_reviews.title: it gets crayon off walls
customer_reviews.text: I sprayed it on my walls and it took the wax of the crayon off the wall, which is all i needed it to do so i could paint. it worked, but it smelled haha that's my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: jessica Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for these well designed WD-40 cans. Literally a zillion different wonderful uses for WD-40 (Google this if you don't already know!). Shipped quickly, no issues. Easy to give 5 stars and highly recommend this as a purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lyle M. Back

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than the stores...
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money. I bought it to spray the spaces in my baseboard because I have been over run by ants & WD40 is an ant deterrent. I needed the cans with straws & this worked. Certainly cheaper than buying at the stores.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen thater

customer_reviews.title: Great dispensers.
customer_reviews.text: WD-40 is a great lubricant, no need to discuss this here. What I liked very much about this presentation is the long applicators and the size of the cans. They are so useful to apply it everywhere you need it! Can't go wrong with this!
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: A very versatile product.
customer_reviews.text: My father first recommended this years ago. It has worked on squeaky hinges, rusted latches, and other items that prove difficult to turn or use which are "stuck" or "frozen" in place. Each application also lasts a long time in correcting the problem and seems to keep the rust at bay. I keep one in the house and one in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, convenient purchase, decent price.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using WD-40 for a very long time. And buying it online makes it easier and more convenient for me, plus the decent price. The quality of product itself is consistent. Everything is still like what I've known.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: How I Use It!
customer_reviews.text: Spray it on your trout fishing bait. Don't laugh, check it out. Woody
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: Stop those Squeeks
customer_reviews.text: This is great for squeekie doors and things that keep getting stuck. I used this to help loosen some screws and also to take bolts off. Works great, just let it set and went back to it, off it the bolts came .
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I love the flip up straws. I can’t tell you how many times I’ve had the plug-in straws fall out during use and/or storage over the years. No more. And of course you get the WD-40 which is almost everybody’s go to.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Miller

customer_reviews.title: It’s WD-40.. 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not much can be said about WD-40 that hasn’t been said or tested before. So if you don’t know what it is, do a quick google search and read some of the never ending wealth of knowledge available
customer_reviews.author: Chase S.

customer_reviews.title: Lovin' my WD-40!!
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a great product! I use it for EVERYTHING, even bug killer (spiders, flies, ants, kills on contact). Have bought two these already, will definitely be buying again!!
customer_reviews.author: TLK

customer_reviews.title: Awesome head design
customer_reviews.text: Dual purpose head design is awesome, and it feels robust enough to not easily break. Not going to test my luck on that by purposefully seeing how tough it is, but am pleasantly surprised so far.
customer_reviews.author: Sayin_Hello

customer_reviews.title: A multipurposes household must have!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a household gem. It's uses are many--from bringing down an annoying fly or freeing up a sticking lock to removing sticky tape residue on glass, it is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Dinae

customer_reviews.title: WD 40
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and has always been a great product. What can I say if you use it like I do buy the big cans or buy it buy the gallon and save your bucks. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Works on most everything
customer_reviews.text: A magical product that renews many things. I have sprayed a small electric motor back to life. Often joke that before they bury me, I would request they spray me with WD40.
customer_reviews.author: David L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Its WD40
customer_reviews.text: I have been using WD40 for many years and will keep using it for many more. I hope. Good price for 2 cans and that is enough to last years. Will buy again from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Bills

customer_reviews.title: Yes get it it's very worth every dollar
customer_reviews.text: It didn't have a safety lock so I had one that leaned and something pressed against the push button so thenext day it was all over my trunck so always secure it as best as you can. But it's still an awesome buy.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: If you don't have a can around the house or shop, you're missing out. This stuff is a mainstay. Smart straws make it easy to spray what you want the WD-40 to work on. Great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Webfarmer

customer_reviews.title: It's the same as it's been my whole life
customer_reviews.text: After I bought it a found some a little cheaper at the store. The store didn't have any until after I bought it. But it's still a good deal and it still works.
customer_reviews.author: Yasica

customer_reviews.title: Who needs a headline for WD-40
customer_reviews.text: WD-40 is kind a like duck tape. Or like putting bacon and cheddar cheese on fatty meat dishes
customer_reviews.author: Mats Hagstrom

customer_reviews.title: always keep this product on hand
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to clean all my garden tools, plus I use it to clean the areas beneath my sliding glass doors.. This is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J. Nihart

customer_reviews.title: perfect product for many uses
customer_reviews.text: This works great on loosening hinges, squeeky hinges, tight screws, taking noises out of equipment, door openers, latches, horse trailer gates and ramps, etc. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jean's ponies

customer_reviews.title: i believe it is a good bargain. I would recommend others purchasing this product
customer_reviews.text: It is a two pack of WD-40. What else is there to say? I prefer this type of spray head. The old style nozzle used to get misplaced. The price was about one and a half the price of one can at the local auto supply store. Add that the product was delivered to my front door, i believe it is a good bargain. I would recommend others purchasing this product. I would buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain
customer_reviews.text: Put this on anything that needs loosening, oiling, or rust inhibitors. The sprayer works with or without the nozzle, great idea.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product to keep around the house. Works great on screws and joints. Wish I could use it on my own joints.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Just read an article about all the things you can do with WD40. Wonderful product. Used it on a squeaky door and everything worked great. Article suggested using it in toilets. I'm trying that next.
customer_reviews.author: In Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Come on ........
customer_reviews.text: Who does not keep WD-40 in the garage for all the things this product works for? So there, it is great and you should buy some.
customer_reviews.author: Hawgfan

customer_reviews.title: Water Displacement 40 a quality product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Unlike the other 39 formulas number 40 does a great job. Google it to find out all the other things you can use it for.
customer_reviews.author: amandaandjack

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Lubes it up great. Works just as well as WD-40 always has.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Good Old WD - 40
customer_reviews.text: Always a use for this stuff - Quick delivery from seller and I will spray all the car door hinges tomorrow...
customer_reviews.author: Keith Mc Cartt

customer_reviews.title: of course I like it. Does exactly what I need it to ...
customer_reviews.text: Come on, it's WD-40, of course I like it. Does exactly what I need it to do and If I get some real 100 mile an hour Duct Tape and not the cheap crap they sell now I could probably put a man on the moon... Pproviding someone else does the math, otherwise there's no guarantee I woulds launch them into the broad side of a barn.
customer_reviews.author: mY

customer_reviews.title: Time-tested lubricant
customer_reviews.text: WD-40 has been around for quite sometime. This can's extended nozzle enables the spray to reach a difficult narrow crevice such as a keyhole. Perfect for the task at hand.
customer_reviews.author: Achilles G. Rances

customer_reviews.title: Everybody’s magical solution
customer_reviews.text: It’s the antique magical lubricant. You know all about it. I can only add I tried it in the toilet to eliminate the hard water mineral ring since I read it would remove it. It didn’t. But it is good for normal uses.
customer_reviews.author: Void

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is good for many things including keeping wasps from building nests under my eves. That is what I use it for
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Big cans!
customer_reviews.text: So glad amazon carried this. We had a flood and ran out of wd 40 in saving our equipment. This was delivered the next day! These are big cans!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: WD-40!
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like about kerosene in a can. I like the new style nozzles, no more losing the little red cap.
customer_reviews.author: GymBEAM

customer_reviews.title: More bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: The size, 14.4 oz, is not commonly sold in stores. Usually see in abundance the 12.0 oz can. The price for these dual cans is very easy on the pocketbook, good enough to put a smile on your face. A highly recommended deal!

customer_reviews.title: My Snow Blower Aims Better New
customer_reviews.text: This works well - as it always has. The built in straw is nice and hard to lose. Nice.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price delivered

customer_reviews.title: Works

customer_reviews.text: I have already used one bottle after receiving the product. It can be used in many ways.

product_meta.title: WD-40 Multi-Use Product with SMART STRAW SPRAYS 2 WAYS, 14.4 OZ [2-Pack]
product_meta.description: Size:-WD-40 Multi-Use Product with SMART STRAW SPRAYS 2 WAYS, 14.4 OZ [2-Pack]Drives out moisture and quickly dries out electrical systems to eliminate moisture-induced short circuits. Acts as a corrosion inhibitor to shield against moisture and other corrosive elements to prevent rust. Frees sticky mechanisms, loosens rust-to-metal bonds and helps release stuck, frozen or rusted metal parts. Lubricates moving parts such as hinges, wheels, pulleys, rollers, chains, and gears. Removes grease, grime, gunk, gum, tar, sap, super glue, sticker residue, and other sticky stuff from multiple surfaces
feature_bullets: Drives out moisture and quickly dries out electrical systems to eliminate moisture-induced short circuits
Acts as a corrosion inhibitor to shield against moisture and other corrosive elements to prevent rust
Frees sticky mechanisms, loosens rust-to-metal bonds and helps release stuck, frozen or rusted metal parts
Lubricates moving parts such as hinges, wheels, pulleys, rollers, chains, and gears
Removes grease, grime, gunk, gum, tar, sap, super glue, sticker residue, and other sticky stuff from multiple surfaces
